Te Whare Tapa Whā

A Model for Our Digital Hauora (Well-being)

💪 Taha Tinana

The Wall of Physical Well-being. How does my online time affect my body?

Strength: ☆☆☆☆☆

🧠 Taha Hinengaro

The Wall of Mental & Emotional Well-being. How do my online experiences affect my thoughts and feelings?

Strength: ☆☆☆☆☆

👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Taha Whānau

The Wall of Social Well-being. How does my online life connect me with my friends and whānau?

Strength: ☆☆☆☆☆

✨ Taha Wairua

The Wall of Spiritual Well-being. Do my online actions match my values and what's important to me?

Strength: ☆☆☆☆☆

🌳 Whenua

The Foundation of Connection & Belonging. Where are the digital spaces I feel safe, connected, and grounded?

🧺 Te Kete Ako

"Whaowhia te kete mātauranga"

Fill the basket of knowledge

Quality teaching resources for Aotearoa New Zealand educators, honoring mātauranga Māori and contemporary pedagogy.
